title: Chicken Tacos
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces
1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
method: Step 1: Combine chicken, lemonade, olive oil, lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce in a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in garlic powder, onion powder, and bay leaf. Simmer until chicken is tender and juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes.

Step 2: Meanwhile, warm the tortillas in the oven or microwave until soft. When chicken is fully cooked, transfer to serving bowl. Place chopped tomatoes, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes. Each person can create their own wrap, using their preferred ingredients.
